notes_display: Analysis by A.A. Gordus, University of Michigan 1974, by Neutron activation of streak
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap edged with a double row of pearls, star in the center of lateral field, surrounded by zigzag design, inner double row of pearls; diadem, pendent diadem ribbons; cheek-flaps; tunica with two cross-like devices; row of pearls on neck-cutout; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 11 h .l. o. mzdysn bgy 'rthštr-MRKAn MRKA 'ry'n | mazdēsn bay Ardašir šāhān šāh Ērān |"The Mazda-worshiping, divine Ardashir, King of Kings of the Iranians"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; four altar slabs; altar flames depicted with vertical strokes; to the left and right mushroom-shaped bases supporting lion-paw structures; below left and right edge of altar table pendent diadem ribbon; dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: 11 h.l. o. NWRA ZY- 3 h l. a. 'rthštr | ādur ī Ardašīr | “the fire of Ardashir”
issue_references_s: SNS 1 Phase 2 Group / Mint B "Hamadan" Type IIa(3a)/3a (2b), flames 1
